程序包 org.bootchart.renderer

类 SVGRenderer

java.lang.Object
org.bootchart.renderer.Renderer
org.bootchart.renderer.SVGRenderer
public class SVGRenderer
extends Renderer
PNGRenderer renders the boot chart as a PNG image.

      public void render​(java.util.Properties headers, BootStats bootStats, java.io.OutputStream os) throws java.io.IOException
      Render the chart.
      指定者:
      render 在类中 Renderer
      参数:
      headers - header properties to include in the title banner
      bootStats - boot statistics
      os - the output stream to write t
      抛出:
      java.io.IOException - if an I/O error occurs
